titles.title: Secret Service Reauthorization Act of 2017
Secret Service Reauthorization Act of 2017
To provide for additional resources for the Secret Service, and to improve protections for restricted areas.
Secret Service Reauthorization Act of 2017

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on the Judiciary.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Crime, Terrorism, Homeland Security, and Investigations.
Committee Consideration and Mark-up Session Held.

calendar.text: Ordered to be Reported (Amended) by Voice Vote.
